import "./DateTime.css"; import BackArrow from '../../../assets/back-arrow.svg' import ContinueArrow from '../../../assets/continue-arrow.svg' import {useState} from 'react'; function DateTime(props) { const [selectedDay,changeSelectedDay] = useState("") const [selectedHour,changeSelectedHour] = useState("") const changeDayHandler = (value) =>{ changeSelectedDay(value) changeSelectedHour("") } return (

); } export default DateTime;
